channel.title: CVE Feed for Kaden -- PICOFLUX AiR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kaden -- PICOFLUX AiR

item.title: CVE-2021-34577|2024-08-04T00:19:46.586Z -- kaden -- picoflux%20air
item.description: In the Kaden PICOFLUX AiR water meter an adversary can read the values through wireless M-Bus mode 5 with a hardcoded shared key while being adjacent to the device.

item.title: CVE-2021-34576|2024-08-04T00:19:47.029Z -- kaden -- picoflux%20air
item.description: In Kaden PICOFLUX Air in all known versions an information exposure through observable discrepancy exists. This may give sensitive information (water consumption without distinct values) to third parties.
